alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 3:15AM CST until January 08 at 9:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle and light freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze up to a few hundredths of an inch. * WHERE...Jefferson County. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. Difficult travel conditions are possible due to icy roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.
